long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Screenchair, sharing your computer screen has never been easier. Whether it's for professional presentations, remote training sessions, or simply showing something to a friend, Screenchair allows you to share your screen in just a few clicks.

How it works:

1) Install the extension: Add Screenchair to your Chrome browser in an instant.
2) Get your sharing ID: Open the extension, click on "Click to view" to display your unique ID (this ID changes every time you want to share your screen).
3) Start sharing: Press "Start sharing" and choose the tab or window you want to share.
4) Share your ID: Give your ID to anyone who wants to connect to your share.
5) Join the share: Go to screenchair.com/connect, enter the ID, and click "Connect" to view the share live.


Key features:

- Easily share your screen with colleagues, friends, or clients.
- Choose exactly what you want to share: a specific tab, a window, or your entire screen.
- Enhanced security with unique identifiers for each sharing session.
- No downloads required for viewers: simply access the link and connect to view the share live.
- Upgrade to Screenchair Premium to share your screen with multiple people simultaneously. For just €9.99, multiple viewers can connect to your share.

⚠️ You cannot share the current tab because it's the one that allows you to share the screen, so don't do anything on the current tab (don't close it, don't refresh it, don't change URL) otherwise sharing will stop.


For any contact or inquiries: torrextension@gmail.com
